features_list.feature_focus: Clean menu that can be used to trigger chats in the CLI that build specific menus.
Conversational flow between the user and hive cli to update product or feature level information.
features_list.feature_brief: This feature will allow a conversational flow between the user and hive cli to update a specific set of product level or feature level information. The focus will be on simple LCI based chat to update JSON files stored locally on the FS.
